 6 -class CmdRestart(ClusterCompleter): 

 7      """ 
 8      restart [options] <cluster_tag> 
 9   
10      Restart an existing cluster 
11   
12      Example: 
13   
14          $ starcluster restart mynewcluster 
15   
16      This command will reboot each node (without terminating), wait for the 
17      nodes to come back up, and then reconfigures the cluster without losing 
18      any data on the node's local disk 
19      """ 
20      names = ['restart', 'reboot'] 
21
